item.title: 丰田公司首席执行官表示，Nexperia 芯片不会立即出现短缺
item.description: 丰田汽车公司首席执行官佐藤浩二（Koji Sato）表示，最近中国对芯片制造商 Nexperia 实施出口限制，丰田汽车不会立即面临芯片短缺问题，尽管该日本汽车制造商正在密切关注生产风险。【原文：Toyota Motor does not face an immediate chip shortage from recent Chinese export restrictions related to chipmaker Nexperia, even as the Japanese automaker is carefully watching risks to production, Chief Executive Koji Sato said.】

item.title: 市场关注中美贸易谈判，油价变化不大
item.description: 周四早盘，油价守住了上一交易日的大部分涨幅，因为投资者在等待当天晚些时候举行的中美贸易谈判，希望有迹象表明给经济增长前景蒙上阴影的紧张局势将得到缓解。【原文：Oil prices held on to most gains from the previous session in early trading on Thursday as investors awaited U.S.-China trade talks later in the day, hoping for signs that tensions clouding the economic growth outlook will ease.】

item.title: 环球音乐与人工智能公司 Udio 就版权纠纷达成和解
item.description: 环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group）周三表示，已与人工智能公司 Udio 就版权侵权案达成和解，两家公司将合作开发一套新的创意产品。【原文：Universal Music Group said on Wednesday it has settled a copyright infringement case with artificial intelligence company Udio and that the two firms will collaborate on a new suite of creative products.】

item.title: 美联储减息、日本央行和特朗普-习近平会晤在即，亚洲股市震荡下行
item.description: 在美联储降息之后，亚洲股市周四早盘在涨跌之间徘徊，投资者在等待中美两国领导人是否会达成贸易协议。【原文：Asian stocks fluctuated between gains and losses early on Thursday after the Federal Reserve cut interest rates and as investors waited to see if U.S. and Chinese leaders will thrash out a trade deal.】

item.title: 田纳西州大众汽车工人投票授权罢工
item.description: 田纳西州一家大众汽车工厂的工人投票授权举行罢工，联合汽车工人工会周三晚间表示，这为查塔努加工厂可能发生的罢工铺平了道路。【原文：Workers at a Volkswagen plant in Tennessee voted to authorize a strike, the United Auto Workers union said Wednesday evening, paving the way for a potential walkout at the Chattanooga facility.】

item.title: 传统芯片蓬勃发展，三星电子第三季度利润跃升 32
item.description: 三星电子周四公布的第三季度营业利润增长了 32%，原因是传统芯片市场的蓬勃发展帮助抵消了人工智能芯片销售的逐步复苏。【原文：Samsung Electronics reported on Thursday a 32% rise in third-quarter operating profit, as the booming conventional chip market helped offset a gradual recovery in its artificial intelligence chip sales.】

item.title: 美联储减息押注消退，美元上涨；日元保持警惕
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的推波助澜下，交易商缩减了对美国12月降息的押注，美元周四走高，在日本央行（BOJ）利率决议公布前将日元压制在八个月低点附近。【原文：The dollar nudged higher on Thursday as traders scaled back bets of a U.S. rate cut in December following push back from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, pinning the yen near an eight-month low ahead of the Bank of Japan's (BOJ) rate decision.】

item.title: 独家报道OpenAI 为估值高达 1 万亿美元的巨型 IPO 奠定基础
item.description: 三位熟悉此事的人士表示，OpenAI 正在为首次公开募股奠定基础，该公司的估值可能高达 1 万亿美元，这可能是有史以来最大的首次公开募股之一。【原文：OpenAI is laying the groundwork for an initial public offering that could value the company at up to $1 trillion, three people familiar with the matter said, in what could be one of the biggest IPOs of all time.】

item.title: 美联储主席候选人里德尔称鲍威尔比预期更鹰派
item.description: 美联储下任主席候选名单上的资产经理里克-里德尔（Rick Rieder）周三表示，他认为降息符合 "明显放缓 "的劳动力市场，美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）在会后新闻发布会上的表现 "比预期鹰派得多"。【原文：Rick Rieder, an asset manager on the short list of possible candidates to be the next chair of the Federal Reserve, said Wednesday he feels interest-rate cuts are in line with a "clearly slowing" labor market and that Fed Chair Jerome Powell was "considerably more hawkish than expected" in his post-meeting news conference.】

item.title: 承保业务强劲，保诚金融季度利润上升
item.description: 保诚金融公司（Prudential Financial）周三报告称，由于国际业务承保强劲和投资收益的帮助，该公司第三季度利润有所增长。【原文：Prudential Financial reported a rise in third-quarter profit on Wednesday as it was helped by strong underwriting in its international business and investment gains.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Pepper Money 公司洽谈收购西太平洋银行抵押贷款经纪业务组合
item.description: 澳大利亚非银行贷款机构 Pepper Money 周四表示，它是一个财团的成员，该财团正在与大型金融机构西太平洋银行就收购后者的抵押贷款经纪业务组合进行谈判。【原文：Australian non-bank lender Pepper Money said on Thursday it is part of a consortium that is negotiating with major financial institution Westpac over acquiring the latter's mortgage broking portfolio.】

item.title: 泰勒科技因 IT 服务需求强劲，季度收入超出预期
item.description: 泰勒科技公司（Tyler Technologies）周三公布的第三季度营收超出华尔街预期，这主要得益于客户对其软件服务的强劲需求，因为客户希望实现数字化运营并将工作转移到云端。【原文：Tyler Technologies beat Wall Street expectations for third-quarter revenue on Wednesday, benefiting from strong demand for its software-based services as customers look to digitize their operations and shift work to the cloud.】

item.title: 赌场运营商米高梅国际酒店集团（MGM Resorts）因拉斯维加斯业务疲软而利润不及预期
item.description: 受拉斯维加斯房地产销售疲软的影响，美高梅国际酒店集团周三第三季度利润未达华尔街预期，导致该赌场运营商股价在盘后交易中下跌 5.5%。【原文：MGM Resorts International missed Wall Street expectations for third-quarter profit on Wednesday, hurt by weak sales at its Las Vegas properties, sending the casino operator's shares down 5.5% in extended trading.】

item.title: Skyworks 首席执行官认为通过与 Qorvo 的交易，有机会为人工智能驱动的手机节省电能
item.description: Skyworks Solutions 公司首席执行官 Phil Brace 周三在接受路透社采访时表示，通过将公司的技术与规模较小的 Qorvo 公司的技术相结合，Skyworks Solutions 公司有望开发出一种芯片，帮助智能手机实现更快的无线数据连接，同时降低功耗。【原文：Skyworks Solutions CEO Phil Brace sees a path toward chips that would help smartphones have faster wireless data connections while consuming less power by combining his firm's technologies with those from smaller Qorvo , he told Reuters in an interview on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚林纳斯公司（Lynas）第一季度收入增长，但仍低于市场预期
item.description: 澳大利亚林纳斯稀土公司（Lynas Rare Earths）周四公布的第一季度营收大幅增长 66.1%，但未能达到市场预期，同时也表明随着战略金属价格的持续波动，市场环境将继续面临挑战。【原文：Australia's Lynas Rare Earths missed market expectations for revenue on Thursday, even as it posted a 66.1% jump in the first quarter, while flagging a continuation of challenging market conditions as prices for strategic metals continue to be volatile.】

item.title: 大盘股盈利爆发，股价反应不一，Meta 下跌
item.description: 周三盘后交易中，在人工智能领域有重大投资的 "七巨头 "公司中，有三家公司的股价涨跌不一，此前这三家巨型公司发布了第三季度财报。【原文：Shares in three of the "Magnificent Seven" companies with significant investments in artificial intelligence were mixed in after-hours trade on Wednesday after the mega caps released third quarter earnings.】

item.title: REUTERS 活动 汽车制造商应对美国电动车市场低迷的办法：混合动力车和廉价车型
item.description: 美国联邦政府取消了为电动汽车和插电式混合动力汽车提供 7500 美元的税收减免，一个月后，汽车制造商正在重新考虑他们的产品线，并把重点放在更便宜的车型上，以保持汽车买家的兴趣。【原文：One month after a $7,500 federal U.S. tax credit for electric vehicles and plug-in hybrids was scrapped, automakers are rethinking their product pipelines and focusing on cheaper models to keep car buyers interested, company executives said on Wednesday at a Reuters conference in Detroit.】

item.title: 日本央行将维持利率不变，日元压力迫在眉睫
item.description: 人们普遍预计日本央行周四将维持利率稳定，但重申决心继续提高仍然较低的借贷成本，以抵御日元进一步下跌可能扩大通胀压力的风险。【原文：The Bank of Japan is widely expected to keep interest rates steady on Thursday, but reiterate its resolve to continue pushing up still-low borrowing costs to fend off the risk of further yen falls that could broaden inflationary pressure.】

item.title: 澳大利亚杂货商 Coles 第一季度销售收入增长 3.9
item.description: 澳大利亚 Coles 集团周四公布，第一季度销售收入增长 3.9%，主要得益于电子商务销售的两位数增长，从而推动了超市部门的盈利。【原文：Australia's Coles Group reported a 3.9% rise in first-quarter sales revenue on Thursday, driven by a double-digit growth in e-commerce sales that boosted its supermarket division earnings.】

item.title: 劳动力市场疲软，Dayforce 季度利润不及预期
item.description: 本周三，Dayforce 公布的第三季度利润低于分析师预期，原因是劳动力市场的不确定性和对贸易关税日益增长的担忧促使企业控制软件支出。【原文：Dayforce reported third-quarter profit below analysts' estimates on Wednesday, as uncertainty in the labor market and growing concerns over trade tariffs prompted companies to rein in software spending.】

item.title: 自由亚洲电台在政府关门之际暂停新闻业务
item.description: 自由亚洲电台（Radio Free Asia）周三表示，在美国联邦政府关门即将满一个月之际，该台将在 "资金不确定 "的情况下暂停编辑业务。【原文：Radio Free Asia said on Wednesday it was suspending its editorial operations amid "funding uncertainty" as the U.S. federal government shutdown edges toward its one-month mark.】

item.title: 埃克森美孚任命格雷戈里-加兰为董事会成员
item.description: 石油巨头埃克森美孚（Exxon Mobil）周三表示，已任命业内资深人士格雷戈里-加兰（Gregory Garland）为公司董事会成员，自 11 月 3 日起生效。【原文：Oil major Exxon Mobil said on Wednesday it has named industry veteran Gregory Garland to its board of directors, effective November 3.】

item.title: HF Sinclair 考虑扩建输油管道以促进美国西海岸燃料供应
item.description: 美国炼油商 HF Sinclair 周三表示，该公司正在考虑扩建横跨落基山和西海岸的输油管道系统，以加强加利福尼亚和内华达等市场的燃料供应。【原文：U.S. refiner HF Sinclair is considering expanding its pipeline systems across the Rocky Mountain and West Coast to bolster fuel supplies in markets including California and Nevada, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 交易日：英伟达蓬勃发展，美联储宽松政策降温
item.description: 周三，华尔街涨跌不一，此前美联储降低了利率，但表示 12 月份降息的可能性不大，而英伟达（Nvidia）成为全球首家市值达 5 万亿美元的公司。投资者现在将注意力转向周四美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与中国国家主席习近平的会晤。【原文：Wall Street was mixed on Wednesday after the Federal Reserve lowered interest rates but signaled a cut in December was in the balance, while Nvidia became the world's first $5 trillion company. Investors now turn their attention to Thursday's meeting between U.S. President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping.】

item.title: KLA 预测第二季度收入增长，但中国市场持续疲软
item.description: KLA 公司周三预计第二季度营收将高于华尔街预期，主要得益于人工智能对其芯片制造工具的强劲需求，但同时也指出了中美贸易紧张局势对其中国业务造成的重大风险。【原文：KLA Corp forecast second-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, banking on strong AI-linked demand for its chipmaking tools, while flagging significant risks to its China business amid Sino-U.S. trade tensions.】

item.title: 意大利特纳里斯公司销售额意外增长 2%，得益于美国和加拿大钻井的稳定发展
item.description: 意大利钢管制造商 Tenaris 周三公布，第三季度净销售额意外增长 2%，原因是北美地区稳定的钻探活动帮助抵消了其他地区的疲软，但 Tenaris 警告称，利润率将受到关税成本 "全面影响 "的打击。【原文：Italian steel pipe maker Tenaris posted a surprise 2% rise in third-quarter net sales on Wednesday, as stable drilling activity in North America helped offset weakness in other regions, but warned margins would be hit by the "full impact" of tariff costs.】

item.title: Wolfspeed 退出破产程序后第一季度利润下降
item.description: Wolfspeed 公司周三公布的第一季度利润疲软，凸显了这家美国芯片制造商在从破产中恢复和面对低迷需求时所面临的挑战，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌超过 7%。【原文：Wolfspeed on Wednesday reported a weaker first-quarter profit, highlighting the challenges facing the U.S. chipmaker as it recovers from bankruptcy and confronts subdued demand, sending its shares down more than 7% in extended trading.】

item.title: 参议院民主党人敦促特朗普不要为贸易协议放宽对中国的国家安全限制
item.description: 以查克-舒默（Chuck Schumer）为首的一群参议院民主党人周三敦促唐纳德-特朗普总统不要为了达成贸易协议而取消对中国的国家安全限制。【原文：A group of Senate Democrats led by Chuck Schumer on Wednesday urged President Donald Trump not to lift national security restrictions on China in pursuit of a trade deal.】

item.title: 人工智能需求激增，ServiceNow上调年度订阅收入预期
item.description: 受人工智能软件解决方案需求增长的推动，ServiceNow 周三上调了年度订购收入预期。【原文：ServiceNow raised its annual subscription revenue forecast on Wednesday, driven by growing demand for its artificial intelligence powered software solutions.】

item.title: 需求不振，Chipotle 再次下调年销售额预期
item.description: 奇波特尔墨西哥烧烤公司（Chipotle Mexican Grill）周三今年第三次下调了年度销售预期，这表明在成本压力不断增加的情况下，即使是其典型的富裕食客也在减少外出就餐。【原文：Chipotle Mexican Grill on Wednesday slashed annual sales forecast for the third time this year, signaling that even its typically affluent diners are cutting back on eating out amid mounting cost pressures.】
